headline: Northern Trust Collaborates With Foundation Source to Provide Modern Private Foundation Management Services
summary: CHICAGO, February 19, 2025--Northern Trust is partnering with Foundation Source, a leading provider of cloud-based charitable giving solutions, to help streamline the operational and grantmaking needs of private foundations. The collaboration enhances Northern Trust’s ability to serve private foundations through sophisticated investment and advisory services – all enabled by purpose-built technology.

headline: A Lingering Question at Coinbase: Who Really Owns the Customers’ Crypto?
summary: An odd thing happened when  Coinbase  reported its quarterly financial results last week.  The bulk of its assets and liabilities abruptly disappeared.  Rather, the company started using a different accounting treatment for the digital tokens it holds on behalf of customers.

raw.headline: A Lingering Question at Coinbase: Who Really Owns the Customers’ Crypto?

headline: Mairs & Power Balanced Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: The Fund lagged the benchmark composite index, which was up 15.01%, while the Fund underperformed the Morningstar Moderate Allocation peer group, which rose 11.29%.
